channel.title: Posts on Agency
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Agency

item.title: themes that work
item.description:
Thanks to all the hardworking and creative theme makers that post to Hugo.

shoutout thanks to you guys I get to have nice looking site. Thank you for your efforts I get my thoughts out.

But why?

Why should anyone crack their heads to provide FREE themes to others? Why spend nights perfecting their themes so that others can have beautiful websites?

It’s amazing you guys rock.

item.title: success almost
item.description:
Can I shout for joy?

It’s almost a success. I’ve finally got the website running on appernetic.io and on the most basic amp theme. I’ve got the posts appearing on the front page and attempting to make the “about” sections to show up.

Let’s try changing theme. If you can read this then the theme change was successful.

Also trying to move a post from default to go under “post” directory so that it shows up on front page.

Take note that this post’s header is in yaml while all the earlier ones were in toml

Why should one go for such hard was to publish when there’s free wix website builders with tons of free pictures? Why do I struggle to put up plain pages? Is it worth it?

item.title: third post
item.description:
No wonder.

Without toml the site won’t publish

item.title: third post but not
item.description:
how Un creative

After the first comes the second and then the third. But this is not good for I have got 1 and 3 but not 2 because I forgot to put it in post directory. So how do I move it?

Hope this is good investment and apprentice thrives.

item.title: firstpost
item.description:
This is the first post and i have no clue what so ever what’s happening. Been typing the about section and now the first post section and am still wondering what’s going to happen to get it to happen. #update Have just seen the youtube “silent movie” style tutorial and published it but nothing is seen yet. WIll come back and test in 15 mins

Am back and today it’s the 28th of April and am not making much progress. The settings file keeps getting deleted and the GitHub does not show the files like a Hugo site should. So it’s not hugo I remind myself. It’s appernetic :)
